name: 7" Split w/ Hector Savage
description: Nine friends, playing in two bands, record four new, passionate songs and press them onto gloriously coloured 7" vinyl. Akela's ›Burt Cokain‹ and ›Nate Kash‹ take the band on a more straightforward direction compared to their previous output, but still maintain that abrasive, raw energy they are known for. Hector Savage present their most aggressive material yet with the two hard-hitting bangers ›Enter Weltschmerz‹ and ›Diagonally Opposite‹, blending their version of technical hardcore with social commentary. The 7" comes in a silkscreened and uniquely handfolded DIY package. Self-released by the bands and distributed via Midsummer Records, there are no dedicated A- and B-sides on this split, no hierarchies or label politics. Just four new, passionate songs, recorded by two bands consisting of nine friends. /// Tracklist /// Akela 01. Burt Cokain 02. Nate Kash Hector Savage 01. Enter Weltschmerz 02. Diagonally Opposite Pressing Info: 300 x clear w/ transparent orange haze Listen to the split here (Akela) and here (Hector Savage).

name: The Void 10"
description: On January 2013 we released four brand new songs, recorded once again at ›Die Tonmeisterei‹ in Oldenburg. Dealing with a fictional family drama, „The Void“ tells an atmospherically dense story of identity loss, isolation, and grief – but also one of hope and the struggle against fate and predestination. /// Tracklist /// A side 01. Exhaust Pipe Dreams 02. Reminder B side 01. The Void 02. Homecoming / Echoes Pressing Info: 50 x white (sold out) 150 x clear red The record comes in a handmade, silk screen-printed cover sleeve, including a download code. Listen to ›The Void‹ here.

name: Orientation 12"
description: On January 2011 we released our debut full-length ›Orientation‹. These 12 songs, which were recorded live within 5 days at ›Die Tonmeisterei‹ in Oldenburg, are dealing with the reflection of your actual point of life and questioning your identity, your own faults and possibilities. /// Tracklist /// A side 01. Maps 02. I Miss Being A Tree 03. Hope 04. The Alarmist 05. Desperation 06. Uncharted Territories B side 01. Indifference 02. A Small Stage In A Cosmic Arena 03. Passion 04. A Song Yet To Be Written 05. The Architect 06. Mazes Pressing Info: 50 x clear milk (sold out) 250 x clear blue The 12" record comes in a handmade, silk screen-printed cover sleeve, including a download code and CD. Listen to ›Orientation‹ here.

name: Orientation CD
description: On January 2011 we released our debut full-length ›Orientation‹. These 12 songs, which were recorded live within 5 days at ›Die Tonmeisterei‹ in Oldenburg, are dealing with the reflection of your actual point of life and questioning your identity, your own faults and possibilities. /// Tracklist /// 01. Maps 02. I Miss Being A Tree 03. Hope 04. The Alarmist 05. Desperation 06. Uncharted Territories 07. Indifference 08. A Small Stage In A Cosmic Arena 09. Passion 10. A Song Yet To Be Written 11. The Architect 12. Mazes The CD comes in a handmade, silk screen-printed digifile. Listen to ›Orientation‹ here.

name: Bundle – All Records
description: Get all of our records for just 20 €! This bundle features: „Orientation“ 12" on clear blue „The Void“ 10" on clear red „Split w/ Hector Savage“ 7" on clear w/ transparent orange haze Every Record includes a download code, the „Orientation“ LP also includes the CD version of the album.

name: Shirt ›Leaves‹
description:
Red screenprint on heather sport grey gildan softstyle shirt.
Size S – XL

name: „Leaves“ tote bag
description: White print on black „Westford Mill“-100% cotton tote bag

name: Patches
description: DIY screenprinted patches: white print on black cotton white print on red cotton yellow print on black cotton sizes: „Logo“: 18 x 7cm „Leaves“: 17 x 17cm

name: Silkscreen Prints „Midnight Souls – farewell shows 2013“
description: These silkscreen prints were done for two farewell shows of the belgian hardcoreband Midnight Souls we had the honor to participate. 1color print (red OR blue) on cardboard (creme, 300 gr/m²) by the size of 29,7 x 42 cm / A3 (11.69 x 16.53 inch). Each print limited to 30 copies. Shipping information: Prints are shipped flat and NOT folded. To save shipping costs, why not ordering more prints together? They’re made with love!

name: Silkscreen Print „The Tidal Sleep / Akela / We Had A Deal / Cannon For Cordoba“
description: This print was done for a show with The Tidal Sleep, Akela, We Had A Deal and Cannon For Cordoba. 2color print (black and orange) on cardboard (silvergrey, 300 gr/m²) by the size of 21 x 29,7 cm / A4 (8.27 x 11.69 inch). Limited to 25 copies. Shipping information: Prints are shipped flat and NOT folded. To save shipping costs, why not ordering more prints together? They’re made with love!

Limited to 50 copies. Shipping information: Prints are shipped flat and NOT folded. To save shipping costs, why not ordering more prints together? They’re made with love!

Limited to 20 copies. Shipping information: Prints are shipped flat and NOT folded. To save shipping costs, why not ordering more prints together? They’re made with love!

name: Bundle – All Silkscreen Prints
description: This bundle features 7 handmade Silkscreen Prints for just 25 € (you will save 10 € !) 23 x 50 cm (9.05 x 19.69 inch): „Tour with Ashes Of Pompeii 2013“ 2color print (black and magenta) on cardboard (grey, 300 gr/m²) 29,7 x 42 cm / A3 (11.69 x 16.35 inch): „Midsummer Indoor Vol. 9“ 2color print (magenta and petrol gradient) on cardboard (creme, 300 gr/m²) „Midsummer Indoor Vol. 10“ 2color print (black and fluo-orange) on rough cardboard (grey, 300 gr/m²) „Midnight Souls farewell show Köln“ 1color print (red) on cardboard (creme, 300 gr/m²) „Midnight Souls farewell show Stuttgart“ 1color print (blue) on cardboard (creme, 300 gr/m²) 21 x 29,7 cm / A4 (8.27 x 11.69 inch): „The Tidal Sleep / Akela / We Had A Deal / Cannon For Cordoba“ 2color print (black and orange) on cardboard (silvergrey, 300 gr/m²) Shipping information: Prints are shipped flat and NOT folded.
